game.name: Sandloop
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Help Hura save her village from invaders by exploring the intricate lands of Iman and gaining ancient skills that will enhance her mobility!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Help Hura save her village from invaders by exploring the intricate lands of Iman and gaining ancient skills that will enhance her mobility!
